src_original: iti |  tataḥ ṣaṣṭhapaṭaloktamantreṇādvayāhaṅkāraṁ kuryāt- oṁ sarvatathā- gatakāyavajrasvabhāvātmako'hamiti ||
tgt_original: oṃ sarvatathāgatakāyavajrasvabhāvātmako'ham |  anena kāyavajrādhi-  ṣṭhānam || āḥ |
daśadiksaṃsthitā buddhāstrivajrābhedyabhāvitāḥ |  adhiṣṭhānapadaṃ me'dya kurvantu vāgvajriṇaḥ ||
